text: Konuş! Sarayda Noyan’a köpeklik eden kim?
english: Who is the dog in the palace?
...Allah's command is with the people of our Prophet...

text: …Gümüştekin Bey’in kızı Goncagül Hatun’u istemeye geldik
english: ...We've come to ask for Goncagül Hatun, the daughter of Mr. Bey in Silver.

text: …gençlere Allah bir ömür boyu aynı döşekte kocamayı nasip etsin demek düşer
english: ...it's time for the young to have a lifetime in the same bed.
I'll take care of Mr. Gündü without blinking.

text: Seni seven, her daim gözeten dostlarından sana selam getirdim beyim
english: I bring you greetings from friends who love you, who watch over you all the time, my lord.

text: Dediler ki Ertuğrul Bey kutlu bir cenk içindedir
english: They said Mr. Ertuğrul is in a holy war.

text: Seneler evvel aldığı vazifeyi layıkıyla yerine getirmiştir
english: He did his duty well years ago.
So you can get to him and say,

text: bu serden geçmiş yiğit yalnız değildir
english: This hero who's gone through the season isn't alone
What do you think, Mr. Artuk?
I say hello to the Whitebeards, sir.
Ertuğrul suddenly appeared in front of us with the Alps.
Karabek was going to name Saadettin Dog.
How did he know Karabek was leaving?
What will happen to Halima Sultan, Noyan?
Sungur won't go against Tekin and Alaeddin.
How does he know the way?
There's a traitor among us, Tangut.
I didn't want to break anyone's hope.

text: Ama bilesin ki ahvalimiz çok çetin
english: But just so you know, we're very tough.
I've seen the courage of many heroes.

text: Türk yurdunun ve İslam aleminin içinde bulunduğu durum için?
english: For the situation of the Turkish homeland and the Islamic world?
We'll go through a big test.
Brother draws his sword on brother
As long as we kill each other
And the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers, etc.) continue to rule.
We buried our minds and hearts
If a resurrection is to begin

text: evvela aklımızı ve gönlümüzü yeniden kazanmalıyız
english: First we must regain our minds and hearts
He's the head of Byzantine Province.

text: Obanı o diyara taşıma gayretinde ol
english: Make an effort to move the Oban to that land.

text: Bir an evvel oraya göz at
english: Take a look over there as soon as you can.
I'll be on my way in no time.
Go get a good night's sleep.

text: Ertesi akşam Sultan Alaeddin'in sarayındaki gözüm
english: The next evening my eye in Sultan Alaeddin's palace
My ear, I'll meet my faithful dog

text: Kurt Boğazı'na kadar olan bu uzun yolda
english: It's a long way down to Wolf's Throat.
I'd like you to accompany me.

text: Ben senin gibileri çok iyi tanırım
english: I know your kind very well.
Like the dust left by the year's horse

text: ilk yağmurda çamur olup çizmeme bulaşırsınız
english: In the first rain, you'll be mud and you'll mess with my boot.
♪ Till I get there and wash it in a stream ♪
Then you'll be forgotten and gone
I don't want to break your heart.
I know you killed that old woman.

text: Kadının cesedi üzerinden senin verdiğin kolye çıktı
english: The woman's body was found on the necklace you gave her.

text: Noyan'ın attığı her adımı emrin üzerine takip ederim
english: I follow every step of Noyan's command.
To go beyond Erzurum at this rate
It won't be possible for our army.

text: Alınması lazım gelen tedbirleri size yazacağım
english: I'm going to write down the measures that need to be taken.

text: Noyan, Abdurrahman'ı kullanıp bize tuzak kurmak ister
english: Noyan wants to use Abdurrahman to set us up.
Did he find out about Abdurrahman?

text: Sen de onu kendi tuzağıyla vurmak istersin
english: You want to shoot him with your own trap.

text: Gayrı kanadı kırık kuş gibi kaçmak yoktur ağabey
english: There's no running away like a bird with a broken wing, brother.

text: Gayrı dilde söz, yürekte sabır kalmamıştır
english: In a different language, there's no patience left in the heart.
I say we cut what the tongue can't cut with a sword.
♪ I say it's time to fight ♪

text: Yani Noyan'ın karargâhına saldıralım mı dersin?
english: So you think we should attack Noyan's headquarters?

text: Belli ki Noyan'ı iki koldan birden vurmak ister
english: He obviously wants to shoot Noyan in both arms.

text: Hem kurduğu tuzaklarla hem de karargâhıyla
english: With his traps and his headquarters

text: O vakit bir an evvel beylerle konuşup ikna edelim
english: Then let's talk to the gentlemen and convince them.

text: İkna edelim ki iki oba bir olduğunda
english: Let's convince him that when two ocoes are one,
Let's show the world what we can do.

text: Artık Noyan'ın hesabını görme zamanı gelmiştir abi
english: It's time to settle Noyan's account, brother.
I called you to listen to my sons.
It's like my mother used to say.
The day is the day when the enemy will sink into life

text: Dağdaki bir avuç eşkıyadan söz etmeyiz
english: We don't talk about a bunch of bandits on the mountain

text: Moğolların en yiğit savaşçılarının olduğu öncü birlikten bahsederiz
english: We talk about the vanguard of the Mongols' bravest warriors.
I hope you've measured it well.

text: Benim tanıdığım Ertuğrul Bey, Baş Alpimiz Gündoğdu Bey'le istişare edip
english: Mr. Ertugrul, whom I know, our chief Alps, has discussed with Mr. Gündoğdu.

text: işin olurunu görmeden bizi buraya çağırmazdı Gümüştekin Bey
english: He wouldn't have called us here until he saw what was coming to him, Mr. Silver.
Noyan was trying to ambush me.
Where did you learn that, Mr. Ertugrul?
The Abdurrahman Alps you know as a traitor
I'm the one who broke him out of the caged tent.
Abdurrahman smuggled the Alps out of the caged tent
I put it next to the Noyan Mutt.

text: Bin yıldır düşmanlarımızın bize yaptığını ben de düşmanlarımıza yaptım
english: I've done to our enemies what our enemies have done to us for a thousand years.

text: Kardeşleri Abdurrahman'ın idam edilmesi için seferber olurken
english: His brothers were mobilising for Abdurrahman's execution.

text: o kardeşleri için kendi canını feda etmekten çekinmedi
english: He didn't hesitate to sacrifice his own life for his brothers.

text: Lakin şimdi Abdurrahman Alp'in hayatı tehlikededir
english: But now Abdurrahman Alp's life is at stake.

text: Hayatını kaybetmeden biz de harekete geçelim deriz
english: Before he loses his life, we'll say, "Let's get moving."
Noyan was trying to ambush me.

text: askerleriyle birlikte Kurt Boğazı'nda vadinin eteklerinde toplanacaklar
english: He and his soldiers will gather at the foot of the valley in the Wolf's Strait.

text: Biz de vadinin üst kısmına tepeden yaya olarak intikal edeceğiz
english: We'll be heading up the valley on foot.

text: Onlar gelmemi beklerken biz yukarıdan saldıracağız
english: We'll attack from above while they wait for me.

text: Tangut'la Noyan'a saldırırken en iyi Alplerimizle saldırmak zorundayız
english: We have to attack Tangut and Noyan with our best Alps.
We'll be with you with my Alps.

text: Baş Alp'imiz Gündoğdu Bey'im ne der?
Anadolu'nun dağlarını onlara dar edelim derim
english: I say we narrow down the mountains of Asia Minor to them.

text: Noyan'ın kardeşime pusu attığı yer burası
english: This is where Noyan ambushed my brother.

text: Her türlü melaneti üzerimize saldığı yer
english: Where he unleashes all kinds of melanade upon us

text: Bu bölgede üç elzem birlikleri var
english: There are three essential troops in this area.

text: Biz Alplerimizle birlikte dere yatağından sızıp
english: We've been sneaking out of the creek bed with our Alps.

text: Sonra da bu dere yatağından da karargahın kalbine ineceğiz
english: Then we'll go down from this creek bed to the heart of headquarters.

text: Kazandıkları zaferlerden kibir gözlerini de kalplerini de öylesine kör etmiştir ki
english: Their pride will blind their eyes and their hearts because of what they used to earn.

text: Demem o ki; hiç beklemedikleri bir anda
english: What I'm saying is, when they least expect it,
If we can break into Noyan's headquarters and attack
They won't be able to fight anymore.

text: Korkut Bey'im de izin verirse bu sefere ben de gelmek isterim
english: If Mr. Scare will let me, I'd like to come along this time.
You know your leg, Mr. Silver
It's better if you don't go.

text: Bu soysuzlara bunca yiğitle çökerken pineklemek bize yakışmaz Artuk Bey
english: It's not for us, Mr. Artuk, to go down on these degenerates with so much courage.

text: Kızımı emanet ettiğim damadımın yanında şehit olmak benim için şereftir
english: It's an honor to be a martyr in the presence of my son-in-law, whom I entrusted my daughter to.
What is said here will remain here.
He's the traitor. It's the tent.
May God forgive us and help us.
What do you see, Great Sage?
Ertugrul was an eagle with broken wings.

text: Artık birbirinden güçlü iki kanadı olacak
english: Now he'll have two wings that are stronger than each other.

text: O kanatlarla hiç durmadan senin üstünde uçacak
english: With those wings, he'll fly on you without stopping

text: Ertuğrul ölmeden sana zafer yok Noyan
english: No victory for you, Noyan, before Ertugrul dies.

text: Gayrı bacağında irin namına bir şey kalmamıştır beyim
english: You don't have any pus left in your leg, sir.

text: Bu halde cenge gitmen akıl kârı değildir beyim
english: It's not wise to go to war like this, my lord.

text: Ben gitmeyeceğim de kim gidecek Artuk Bey?
english: I won't go, but who will, Mr. Artuk?
Even if it's death at the end

text: varıp ümüğüne çökeceğim o soysuz Moğol'un
english: I'll come and fall into the curse of that degenerate Mongol
And as a gentleman of the Oban,

text: hem de devletin vazifelendirdiği biri olarak o cenge gitmeliyim
english: And as a government official, I have to go to that war.

text: Hayırdır yiğidim, Alpler nereye gidecek böyle?

english: What the hell are they up to?

text: Hoş geldin Halime Sultan Hoş geldin Demir dede
english: Welcome, Halima Sultan. Welcome, Grandpa Iron.

text: Hele söyle bakalım biz burada yokken obada önemli şeyler oldu mu?
english: Tell me, when we weren't here, did anything important happen in the Oba?

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im hainleri obadan temizledi beyim
english: Mr. Ertugrul cleared the traitors of the obama, sir.
Is Mr. Ertugrul in the obada?

text: Allah'ıma şükürler olsun yuvana döndün Halime Sultan
english: Thank God you're home, Halima Sultan.

text: Ben bir gün bile olsun yuvamdan ayrı kalmadım ki
english: I've never been away from home for a day.
I'm home, my home is inside me
And you in the head corner.
We're one with the apricots and the Dodurga.
We'll go to Cenge Halima Sultan
We'll trap the Noyan Mutt in his own trap

text: Lakin ben Sungur Tekin'i derim Ertuğrul
english: But I call Sungur Tekin Ertuğrul

text: Sungur Tekin Bey'im sana haber etti
english: Mr. Sungur Tekin has informed you.
He'll be waiting for you at the caravan house tonight.

text: İki eli kanda da olsa gelsin dedi
english: He said to come with both hands in the blood.
He said he'll be at the caravan house tonight.

text: Sungur Tekin, Alaeddin'in emriyle Ögeday'ı öldürmeye gider
Bu senin işin. Sakın yüzümü kara çıkartmayasın

english: At last, Ertuğrul fell into my hands.

text: Yolun açık, gazan mübarek olsun beyim
Bu zaferde benim de terim gerekirse kanım dökülsün isterim
english: In this victory, if I need a term, I want my blood spilled.

text: Hayallerinin babanın otağına sığmayacak kadar büyük olduğunu bilirim
english: I know your dreams are too big to fit in your father's bed.

text: Bu cenkte de bunu ispat edesin
english: In this war, you must prove it.

text: Halime Sultan'la Deli Demir sana Sungur Tekin'den haber getirmişler ana
english: Halima Sultan and Mad Demir have brought you news from Sungur Tekin, Mother.

text: Şükür yarabbim. Deyin hele, nasıldır oğlum?
Çocukken ona verdiğim kılıçla Moğolları biçerken görseydin Hayme Ana
english: If you'd seen me mowing Mongols with the sword I gave him as a child, Mother Hayme
It's almost time to say good.
He grew up and saved our lives.
He waits for Ertugrul Bey in caravansaray

text: Sungur Tekin niye obaya gelmez de Ertuğrul'u çağırır?
english: Why doesn't Sungur Tekin come to the office and call Ertuğrul?
I'll find out when I get there, Ma.

text: Ertuğrul, Alpler hazır Beylere ne diyelim?
english: Ertugrul, the Alps are ready. What shall we tell the gentlemen?

text: Sungur Tekin iki eli kanda da olsa gelsin demiş
english: Sungur Tekin said to come with both hands in the blood

text: Eğer bana ihtiyacı olmasaydı böyle bir şey söylemezdi bilirsin
english: He wouldn't say that if he didn't need me, you know.
His blood is lawful to you, brother.

text: Sağ olasın beyim Sağ olasın beyim
english: Thank you, sir. Thank you, sir.
May God forgive you and help you.

text: Bizi cenge sokan o. Şimdi de
english: He's the one who got us into this fight.
He must have something more important to do.

text: En az Noyan meselesi kadar mühim bir vazife
english: A task as important as the Noyan matter
Mr. Ertugrul won't come with us.
We'll meet the Alps down the valley.
Dumrul will tell you what to do

text: Yolun açık olsun demek istedim beyim
english: I just wanted to say good luck to you, sir.

text: Allah bileğine güç, kılıcına keskinlik atının ayağına tezlik eylesin
english: May God give you strength to your wrist, to your sword, to the foot of a sharp horse.
The more you see this, the more I wait for you.

text: Seni hatırlamak için buna ihtiyacım yok
english: I don't need this to remember you.

text: Ulan az bir tek dur! Yiyeceksin tepiği göreceksin şimdi gününü ha!
english: You're gonna get your ass kicked!

text: Aşığın tepiği yaman olur Dikkat edesin
english: A lover's kick can be a pain in the ass. You better watch out.

text: Ne bileyim kardeş? O bilmemizi istemezse
english: I don't know, bro, if he doesn't want us to know.
It's forbidden for us to know

text: Ben neler olduğunu bilirim Turgut kardeş
english: I know what's going on, Brother Turgut.
The door to the realm of secrets has been opened to our master.

text: O kapıdan sadece beyimiz girecek İstediğinde de çıkacaktır
english: Only our master walks through that door and comes out whenever he wants.
He's from another world now, brother.
May God make you as he knows you.
Let's keep our promise to Aygirl

text: Yüreğime aşkın düştü düşeli sana gün yüzü gösteremedim Halime Sultan
english: Since your love fell in my heart, I couldn't show you the light of day, Halima Sultan.
You don't know what peace is.

text: Cenksiz, acısız bir gün yaşatamadım sana
english: I couldn't give you a day without mercy, without pain.

text: Bana yüreğini verdin, yetmez mi Ertuğrul?
english: You've given me your heart, haven't you, Ertugrul?

text: Bu kısa ömürde ne için mücadele ettiğini bilmez miyim?
english: Don't I know what you're fighting for in this short life?

text: birlik, dirlik kavgası değil mi senin kavgan?
Senin gibi bir Alp'in yanında olma şerefi bana yeter
english: I've had enough of the honor of being with an Alpine like you.

text: Ayağın tam iyileşmeden yola çıkmandan endişe duyarım ağabey
english: I'm worried you'll be on your way before your foot is fully healed, brother.
I won't leave this victory to Ertuğrul Aytolun

text: Girmediği cengin zaferi ona mı kalmış?
english: The victory of the war he didn't enter is up to him?
Do you know where you're going?

text: O vakit hiçbir şeyden emin olamayız
english: Then we can't be sure of anything.

text: Goncagül denilen o şirret avradın asıl derdi Gündoğdu Bey'im değildir Halime
english: It's not my Mr. Gündo that's the problem with that bitch called Goncagül.

text: Onların hepsinin tek bir isteği vardır
Selcan, sen ne dediğini bilir misin?
english: Selcan, do you know what you're saying?
Then they'll want to be set up in the spring.

text: Bu obada artık hiçbir şey eskisi gibi olmayacak Halime
english: Nothing will ever be the same again in this room, Halima.

text: Selcan, Allah aşkına ne diyeceksen açık açık de
english: Selcan, for God's sake, say what you have to say.

text: hepsi bir olup bizi bir felakete sürüklemek isterler
english: They all want to be united and lead us into a disaster.

text: Aytolun denilen o avrat dayımın oynaşı olmuştur
english: My uncle Aytol's been fooling around.
That's the old lady who said that to me.
He was killed on her evening.

text: bunlar bizden daha çok şey saklar
english: They hide more from us than they do from us.

text: Ben hepsini bir bir ortaya çıkartacağım
english: I'm going to bring it all out.
Are you with me on this road?

text: Şuradaki çalılara adam yerleştir Bu tarafa da
english: Put men in those bushes over there and over here.

text: Ertuğrul’un kaçmasına izin veremeyiz Hadi, çabuk
english: We can't let Ertugrul get away. Come on, let's go.

text: Ertuğrul burada Noyan Az önce içeriye girdi
english: Ertuğrul here Noyan just walked in

text: Demek Süleyman Şah’ın evlatlarının buluşmasına tanıklık edeceğim
english: So I will witness the meeting of the sons of Solomon Shah.

text: Öldürmek için daha güzel bir gün olamaz
english: There can't be a better day to kill

text: Seni en son gördüğümde Hazar Denizi’nin kıyısındaydın
english: Last time I saw you, you were on the edge of the Caspian Sea.
You had your horse on the king's side.

text: Elinde Deli Demir’in yaptığı bu kılıç vardı
english: He had this sword made by Mad Demir.

text: Babam Süleyman Şah, ağabeyim Gündoğdu ile cenge gitmekteydin
english: You were going to war with my father, Solomon Shah, my brother Gündü.

text: Sen de yaşına başına bakmadan ben de Moğollarla vuruşacağım diyordun
english: You said you were going to fight the Mongols without looking your age.

text: Anam da seni zapt etmek için Deli Demir’e tuttururdu kollarını
english: My mother used to hold on to Crazy Iron to keep you in line.
It's daylight, there might be other Mongols around.

text: Şimdi beni dinle Kimse yerinden kıpırdamasın
english: Now listen to me. Nobody move.

text: Başka Moğol olup olmadığını anlamak için ben önden bakacağım
english: I'll take the lead to see if there are any other Mongols.

text: Noyan itinin öldüğünü görmeden şehit olmak yok bize
english: We don't want to be martyrs until we see the Noyan Mutt dead.

text: Millet için canımız, mavi gökte su damlası bile edemez Gündoğdu oğlum
english: For the people, our love can't even drop water in the blue sky. It's dawn, my son.

text: Sen burada dur ki Alplerin başında bir komutan olsun
english: You stay here so there's a commander at the top of the Alps.

text: Son ana kadar yerinizden asla ayrılmayın
english: Don't ever leave your seat until the last moment.
Tell him Karabek's messenger has arrived.
This is very important to Noyan.

text: Senin hasretin içimizde kor oldu ağabey
english: Your longing is burning inside us, brother.

text: Yıllar geçtikçe o kor yangına döndü
english: Over the years, that ember turned into a fire.

text: Lakin seni bulma umudunu hiçbir vakit yitirmedik
english: But we never gave up hope of finding you.
I'll make you sorry you're not dead, Tugtekin.
You'll curse the day you were born, Tangut

text: Benim küçük kardeşimin yerine delice bir yiğit gelmiş derler
english: They say my little brother has been replaced by a madman.
From the land where the sun rises to the land where it sets.
...to stand up to all of them...
...he's got no man left to turn to.

text: Yiğitlikte senin eline su dökemeyiz ağabey
english: We can't put our hands on you in bravery, brother.
You smell like my dad, bro.

text: Halep’ten sonra, sultanımızın yanında Moğollarla savaşmak için Erzurum’a geldik
english: After Aleppo, we came to Erzurum to fight the Mongols alongside our sultan.
I know all about it, brother.
The Templars that you've been up to in Aleppo...
...Halime Sultan, I will soon be certain...

text: …anamı, babamı beylik yükünü omuzladığını, her şeyi
english: ...mommy, my father shouldering his royal burden, everything.
If it weren't for that longing inside me

text: Babam ve Gündoğdu ağabeyimle katıldığım savaşta esir düştüm
english: I was captured in the battle with my father and brother.
My mother never believed she was dead.
Then I took a chance and ran.

text: Tek düşündüğüm obama ailemin yanına gelmekti
english: All I could think about was coming to my Obama family.
I saved a man's life on the way.

text: …bu adam Cengiz Han’ın en yakınındaki adamlardan biri
english: This man is one of the closest men to Genghis Khan.

text: Bana güvendi Beni Cengiz Han’a götürdü
english: He trusted me He took me to Genghis Khan

text: Hanın huzuruna çıktım Bana ödül verdi
english: I stood before the inn He gave me a reward

text: Sonra bu adam beni Cengiz Han’ın oğlu, Ögeday’a götürdü
english: Then this man led me to the son of Genghis Khan.

text: Duyduğum her şeyi Sultan’ımız Alaeddin’e yazıp göndermek için bu oyunu oynadım
english: I've played this game to send everything I've heard to our Sultan Alaeddin.
For the state of Alaeddin, our Sultan...

text: …Moğol siyasetini benim gönderdiğim bilgilerle idare etti
english: ...Mogul managed his politics with the information I sent him.
We've come back from the brink of war many times
With the wisdom of our Sultan, my intel.
...he brought us back from the brink of many wars.
The target of the Cruel Item is Anatolia

text: Onun ordusu eğer buraya ayak basarsa…
english: If his army sets foot here...

text: …taş üstünde taş omuz üstünde baş koymazlar
english: They don't put their heads on rocks and stone shoulders.
I haven't called you in years, I haven't asked.

text: Çünkü beni şehit bilmeniz en doğrusuydu
english: Because it's best that you know me as a martyr.
I have one last mission left, brother.
That's why I wanted to see you.

text: Devletim için, senin için hayatım fedadır ağabey
english: For my government, for you, my life is a sacrifice, brother.

text: Sultan Alaeddin, Moğol ordusunda savaşan Türklerin…
english: Sultan Alaeddin said that the Turks who fought in the Mongol army...

text: …ordudan çekilmesi için bana vazife vermiştir kardeşim
english: ...has given me my duty, brother, to withdraw him from the army.

text: Sultanımız, bu mührün Oğuzlar üzerindeki gücüyle…
english: Our Sultan, with the power of this seal over the Oğuz...
...the brotherhood we've lost hopes that our bonds will be strengthened.
I'll go to the horse country for this.

text: Nasıl bir gücü olacak ki bu mührün?
english: What power would this seal have?
The seal is what's seen, brother.

text: Asıl mesele, Moğol’a hizmet eden kardeşlerimize
english: The question is, our brothers and sisters who serve the Mongolians.
To remind you of who they are

text: Onları kölelikten kurtarmak ve Moğol ordusunu bölmektir
english: To free them from slavery and divide the Mongol army

text: Eğer Türkler bu kadar destek vermeselerdi…
english: If the Turks hadn't been so supportive...
But if we don't gather the world of Islam...
...if we don't get help from the other Muslims...

text: …Sultan Alaeddin tek başına hiçbir şey yapamaz
İnşallah o günler de gelecektir kardeşim
english: Let's hope those days come, brother.

text: Şimdi, iki elin kanda da olsa gel dememin sebebine gelince
english: Now, about the reason I asked you to come with both hands in the blood.
I want you to get me a meeting with the Whitebeards.

text: Onlar olmadan bu işin altından kalkamam
english: I can't do this without them.
So you have the seal of Oğuz Khan
Tell me about my Sungur Tekin
Tell me so I can get my strength back.
Has the sun of the moor scorched your skin?
Do you have stripes on your face?
The last time I saw him...

text: Nasıl böyle yiğit bir adam olmuş?
english: How did he become such a brave man?

text: Ağzından seninle Süleyman Şah’ımı hiç düşürmedi ana
english: With you in his mouth, Solomon never let down my Shah.

text: geçen bunca zamana rağmen attığınız her adımı…
english: After all this time, every step you've taken...
...he knows every breath you take, mother.
How do you know my secret, brother?
Let's just say the cranes flew in and called it in.
I'm always here for you, brother.

text: Anamla Gündoğdu ağabeyim de seni göreydi
english: My mother and the sun came up, and my brother was there for you.
I'll return to Obama after I've completed my service.
I don't have time to lose.
...and kiss my brother's hand at dawn.
I don't have time to lose.

text: İhanetini öğrendiğim gün leşini ulu ruhlara adadım Sungur Tekin
english: The day I learned of your betrayal, I dedicated your carcass to the great spirits, Sungur Tekin.
I'll give you both your carcasses to the spirits.

text: Oğuz Han’ın mührü de ödülüm olacak
english: The seal of Oğuz Khan will be my reward

text: Yarabbi bana bir kez daha evlat acısı yaşatma
english: Oh, God, don't make me suffer another son.
I know the trap you set for me.
My Alps are burning down your headquarters.
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait.

text: Abdurrahman’ı o hâlde görünce anladım beyim. Hata ettim
english: When I saw Abdurrahman like that, I knew it was wrong.

text: Sana olan öfkeme yenilecek kadar zavallıymışım meğer
english: It turns out I'm pathetic enough to lose my anger at you.
My blood is lawful to you.

text: Senin kanın bu toprağa bile haramdır
english: Your blood is forbidden even to this land.
...a cold wind covered my whole body.
In the hope that he'll come back
Now, if that hope goes away...
I don't have the strength to breathe.
I'm afraid I won't be able to see him.
I'm a victim. Open your eyes, man!

text: Moğol'a verdiğim iki evladımın ardından Allah seni bana bağışladı
english: After the two children I gave to Mongol, God has forgiven you.
♪ With your sword and your bow ♪
With your courage, you have won my daughter's heart.

text: Gayrı bugün benim en mutlu günümdür
english: Besides, today is my happiest day.

text: Aman dileyen insana el kalkmaz. Lakin
english: You don't touch a man who wishes but you don't.
Let's capture them and take them to the oba.

text: Belki bir yiğidimizin hayatını kurtarmaya vesile olacaklar
english: They may be the means to save the lives of a warrior.
Did that dog run away, sir?
We will return to Obaya with victory, my lord.
This victory belongs to all of us, brother.

text: Otağda öğrenelim bakalım ne işler dönüyor
english: Let's find out what's going on in the tent.
Wait till you hear from me.
♪ Hold on, I'll be your victim ♪
It's all done, just like I promised.
As you agreed with Mr. Gündüz,
My men will move the goods.

text: Akşama kadar da malları kervana yükler
english: And he loads the goods in the caravan till the evening.
We'll leave in the morning, God willing.
May God make your way clear.

text: Kimse bir şey bilmez, bilen de bir şey söylemez
english: No one knows anything, and no one knows anything.
What's it got to do with a government secret?
Mongolia trouble, we must be cautious.

text: Bendeki de boş tüccar ağzı işte
english: I've got an empty merchant's mouth.

text: Altınları tek tek saymadan sakın malları obadan dışarı çıkarmayasın Efrasiyab
english: Don't let the goods out of the room until you count the gold one by one.
Deliver the gold to Mr. Artuk
He'll distribute it to the rightful owners.

text: Beylerimiz sağ salim obaya döndüler Hayme Ana
english: Our gentlemen have returned safely to the Oba, Mother Hayme.

text: onun cezasını vermek de bana düşer
english: It's up to me to punish him.

text: El Şafi isminin hürmetine ben elimden geleni yapacağım
english: I'll do my best to honor the name El Shafi.
But don't get your hopes up
Let the dervish prepare a little hot water.

text: Hadi, siz de az çıkın dinlenin

english: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
Death to the Mongol, death to the traitor!

text: Bizans'a kadar bütün bu topraklar bizim olacak Efrasiyab
english: All this land will be ours until Byzantine.

text: Demek bu kez siz saldırdınız ha?
english: So you attacked him this time, huh?
He has given us the wrath of the enemy.
To my lord who has shown me this blessed day

text: Siz böyle aslanlar gibi dimdik durdukça
english: As long as you guys stand tall like lions
You'll bring his carcass, God willing.

text: Noyan bundan gayrı kolay kolay toparlanamaz
english: Noyan can't recover easily from this.
To the gentlemen who gave us this victory

text: Yüce Allah, şehitlerimizi cennetine kabul etsin
english: May the Almighty receive our martyrs to his paradise.
Thank God we've seen it today.
I'll look at your face without shame, Dad.
We stood by our promise, son.
Our moongirl's blood is still on the ground.
Listen carefully to what I have to say to you, son.
Make a home for yourself, son.
The pride of Kayi raise the Alps

text: Aykız da seni mutlu görmek isteriz
english: We'd like to see you happy in the moonlight.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'imle nicedir mezar taşlarımız olsun
english: How many gravestones have we had with Mr. Ertugrul?

text: binlerce yıl sonra bu taşları görüp de
english: Thousands of years later, I've seen these stones
We'd like him to read the Fatiha on our head, Father.
We'll say we'll have a homeland
From this land till I'm cast out
Until I have my headstone, my shadow
It's forbidden for me to stop.
Find Noyan, tell him I'm waiting for his orders.
I loved you like my own child

text: Baban, Süleyman Şah'ımın yanında şehit düştüğünde
english: When your father died in the presence of my king Solomon

text: otağımda evlatlarımla aynı döşeğe yatırdım seni
english: I put you in the same bed as my children in my bed.
Wrapped it up like a mother
If I said something to you,
If I spit in your face
With the blood of all the Alps on your hands
Thin of hair, sharp of sword
How are you going to get through the line?
With all that blood in your brother's blood

text: onlara Allah'ın rahmetinden bir yudum vermedin
english: Thou hast not given them a sip of the mercy of Allah.
And you didn't let them testify.

text: Yiğit olaydın da benim karşıma çıkaydın
english: You've been a hero, and you should've stood up to me.
You should have asked me to answer with your sword.
I'll execute you in the training room.
If there's any fear of God left in you
Who is the cause of this, Great Sage?
When you admit it to yourself

text: Çolak bir keçi çobanı onu yendi
english: He was defeated by a mangled goatherd.

text: Demek siz de tuzağa düştünüz ha?

english: He lured us into our own trap.

text: Ona tuzak kurduğumu nasıl anladı ha?
english: How did he know I set him up, huh?
They took me to the oba.
Kill all the soldiers who escaped

text: Ögeday'dan yeni bir öncü birlik isteyin
english: Ask Itemday for a new pioneer unit
We'll build our headquarters in Erlik Cave
Why should the spirits be angry with me?

text: Burada yalnız başına ne edersin Noyan?
english: What do you do here alone, Noyan?
Efrasiyab waits for his orders Noyan

text: Noyan, Ertuğrul'un nereye gittiğini bilmek ister
english: Noyan wants to know where Ertugrul went.
Let him come to the place where we meet all the time.
Every time my father goes to war

text: hem babamı, hem erimi yolladım cenge
english: I sent both my father and my soldier to the battle.
Thank God you're safe and sound.
But our women die a thousand times.
I know it from my mother.

text: Hangimizin cengi daha çok yürek yakar dersen
english: If you say which of us has a fight that hurts more

text: Allah sizi başımızdan eksik etmesin beyim
english: May God keep you in mind, my lord.
He's waiting for you with Mr. Tugtekin, Dad.
The coyote we raided his lair, he's gone.

text: Biz de tedbirlerimizi alırız o halde
o çakalın ensesinden düşmeden her daim peşinden gitmek gerekir
english: You'll always have to go after him before he falls off that coyote's back.

text: ne de askerlerine bir lahza olsun nefes aldırmamalıyız
english: Nor should we allow his soldiers to breathe at all.
This writing will look great on my mother.
Gökçe, do you think they have colors?
How can you be so relaxed?

text: Gün geçmez ki Ertuğrul'un başına bir bela gelmesin
english: Not a day goes by that Ertuğrul won't get in trouble.

text: Ya da gün geçmez ki hepimizin başına bir bela açmasın
english: Or we'll all be in trouble for the rest of the day.

text: Ben onun başına bir hâl gelecek diye
english: I thought he was gonna get hurt.
♪ Every night I'm sleeping in a pigeon's sleep ♪

text: Gelecekse her bela beyimden gelsin isterim Gökçe
english: If it's coming, I'd like every trouble from my master, Gökçe

text: Ondan gelen her belanın bilirim ki dermanı da yine ondadır
english: I know every trouble that comes from him, and he's got it.

text: hem sarayın aklını temsil eden adamsın
english: And you're the man who represents the court's mind.

text: Senin her söylediğin benim için kıymetlidir
english: Anything you say means something to me.

text: Sen ne söylersin bu aslan parçalarının dediklerine?
english: What do you say to these pieces of lion?
He's going to stage a suicide attack on the night.

text: kadar gözü dönmüş bir deli var karşımızda
english: We're dealing with a madman who's as desperate as he is.

text: Bu dağları Noyan'a da ordusuna da dar edeceğiz
english: We're going to make these mountains difficult for Noyan and his army.

text: Beyim, Ertuğrul Bey yaralı bir adamla obaya geldi
english: Sir, Mr. Ertugrul has come to the office with a wounded man.
Mr. Ertugrul is coming, Hayme Ana.

text: Atının terkisinde bir de yaralı taşır
english: He'll carry a wounded man on his horse's abandonment.
I made you a promise, Mother.
I told you I'd bring your son.
